description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fn4g3","text":"Autosomal recessive mutations in PTEN-induced kinase 1 (PINK1) are linked to early-onset Parkinson's disease (PD) [1]. Upon mitochondrial depolarization, PINK1 activates through autophosphorylation and stabilization on mitochonria [2]. Pink1 phosphorylates ubiquitin and Parkin, triggering mitophagy to remove damaged mitochondria in PD [3]. To delve deeper into the impact of PINK1 mutations, a PINK1 knockout (KO) HeLa cell line was utilized as a model system. Additionally, stable cell lines with mutated PINK1 were established to explore differences in functional activity and the formation of the PINK1-TOM complex between wild-type PINK1 and its mutant variants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b02v4","text":"Maintain cells at   in a 5% CO2 water-saturated incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":30,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1CE74C64E28211EEAA700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dro3b","text":"Achieve doxycycline-induced, stable expression of exogenous protein using the Flp-In T-Rex system according to Invitrogen's instructions, utilizing CRISPR knock-out PINK1 KO HeLa Flp-In T-Rex cells [4]. The exact steps are detailed below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9o00i","text":"The cell culture passages usually used are from P10 to P20. The passages are never used above P25.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7uu3d","text":"Grow HeLa cells in Dulbecco’s modified eagle medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% (v/v) fetal bovine serum (FBS), 2mM L-glutamine, 100 U/ml penicillin, and 0.1 mg/ml streptomycin (complete media).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Maintenance of HeLa Flp-In T-Rex Stable Cell Lines:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"de9ba","text":"For HeLa Flp-In T-Rex stable cell lines, use complete media supplemented with blasticidin and zeocin before recombination/transfection for stable cell line generation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Maintenance of HeLa Flp-In T-Rex Stable Cell Lines:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6nv48","text":"Supplement with blasticidin and hygromycin B following recombination/transfection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sseb","text":"Maintain HeLa PINK1 knock-out Flp-In T-Rex cells in blasticidin and zeocin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"elg52","text":"Wash cells with PBS wash and switch to complete media   before transfection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9645l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bo64","text":"Carry out transfection by co-transfecting integratable hygromycin-resistant pcDNA FRT/TO vector of desired PINK1/mutant with pOG44 expressing the Flp recombinase using Lipofectamine3000 in 100mm Petri dish [5, {"blocks":[{"key":"9qfaj","text":"Mix the 2 tubes and keep at RT for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"FCDDDBBBE28211EEAA700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fr4l","text":"Add the transfection mix drop by drop in the plate containing HeLa PINK1 knock-out Flp-In T-Rex cells. Keep a plate of untransfected cells as a negative control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2facu","text":"After   of transfection, split the cells with around 25% confluency. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"13636E35E28311EEAA700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l8r3","text":"Once the cells are attached, add fresh complete media supplemented with blasticidin and hygromycin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ij0h","text":"Maintain the cells with regular media changes every 2-3 days. Remove dying/dead cells when required. If successful, you will see separate colonies growing. Colonies amount varies from 10-50 per plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83or0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1fev7","text":"Trypsinize surviving colonies after 3-4 weeks of selection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9d8m9","text":"Expand the selected colonies, and induce protein expression with   doxycycline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.02","error":false,"guid":"3F0E2F95E28311EEAA700A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3227}}}}
